casebody.head_matter:
432 A.2d 1381
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James (NMN) BANNER a/k/a James (NMN) Reid, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 18, 1981.
Decided July 10, 1981.
William H. Proctor, York, for appellant.
Thompson J. McCullough, William T. Hast, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
